paragraphs.text:
val profile = sc.textFile("../files/profile.txt")
profile.count()
profile.first()
val twitter = profile.filter(line => line.contains("twitter"))
val profilerdd = profile.map(line => line.split("\t"))
val verified = profilerdd.filter(x => x(1)== "True").count()
val notverified = profilerdd.filter(x => x(1)=="False").count()
profilerdd.count()
verified + notverified
val rdd2 =  profilerdd.filter(c => (c(1) != "False") & (c(1) != "True") ).count()
val follower = profilerdd.filter(x => x(4).toInt < 1000 ).count()
val wc = profilerdd.flatMap(line => line.split("\t")).map(word => (word, 1)).reduceByKey((x,y) => x+y)
wc.sortBy(x => x._2, ascending=false).take(10).foreach(println)
val location = profilerdd.map(x => x(6)).map(x=> (x,1)).reduceByKey((x,y) => x+y).sort(x=> x._2, ascending = false)
location.take(5).foreach(println)
val friends = profilerdd.map(x => (x(19), x(11).toInt)).sortBy(x => x._2, false)
friends.take(15).foreach(println)
val mfollowers = profilerdd.filter(x => x(25) == "m").map( x => x(19), x(4).toInt)).sortBy(x => x._2, false)
friends.take(15).foreach(println)
